org.apache.heron.common.utils.metrics

Interface ISpoutMetrics

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ComponentMetrics
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FullSpoutMetrics, SpoutMetrics

    public interface ISpoutMetrics
extends ComponentMetrics
    Spout's metrics to be collect We need to: 1. Define the metrics to be collected 2. New them in the constructor 3. Register them in registerMetrics(...) by using MetricsCollector's registerMetric(...) 4. Expose methods which could be called externally to change the value of metrics
